entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
